attributes.action: Give the £3. Million the Queen wants to stop her palace crumbling to the flood victims of Britain instead, The needs of the victims are greater than the Queen,s.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be more fitting to help the flood victim,s, many of whom have lost everything and have no insurance, than to assist the Queen, ( the wealthiest woman on earth), with her house maintenance.Come on Gordon let this country help their own diasater victim,s for once.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
